column4: How do i edit the package for the screen resolution from terminal?
How do i edit the xorg.conf file?
: i want to install nvidia drivers .run files I ran them as root but it tells me that there is a x-server running and i have to close it,how do i do that?
login, then enter "sudo killall Xorg", then you can run the program
: did ctrl alt f1 > killall Xorg then sudo sh nvidiadriver.run
: didnt work still says x server runiing
k, moment, i have to check something
k, press ctrl+alt+F1, log in and enter "sudo killall -s KILL Xorg" and "sudo killall -s KILL gdm" (or kdm, if you use kubuntu) and then run the file again
was this a crash or a reboot?
did it suddenly reboot, or with a huge delay?
: I think i need   sudo /etc/init.d/gdm stop
